title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
We’re seeking a motivated Ads Executive / Performance Marketer to oversee and enhance ad campaigns across several platforms. You’ll collaborate with creative and content teams to execute campaigns on Facebook, Google, and TikTok with a strong focus on efficiency and results.

Requirements:

At least 1 year of experience managing multi-platform campaigns

Understanding of marketing funnels and performance KPIs (CPA, ROAS, CTR)

Solid analytical skills and experience with split testing

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
